visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a stock chart with the following specifications: Chart type: stock, Chart title: 'AAPL Stock Price', Axes and labels styling: Use 'IBM Plex Sans' font for all text elements with a font size of 14px for labels and titles, Data series: Include a single series named 'AAPL' with data fetched from 'https://demo-live-data.highcharts.com/aapl-c.json', Custom colors: Apply a green color (#06d001) to the Fibonacci Time Zones annotations when the 'Apply colors' button is clicked, Additional configurations: Set the range selector to display one range, disable ordinal x-axis, and include a subtitle 'With Fibonacci Time Zones'.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a stock chart displaying the AAPL stock price. The chart includes a title and subtitle styled with the 'IBM Plex Sans' font and a font size of 14px. The x-axis and y-axis labels are also styled with the same font and size. The chart includes a single data series named 'AAPL' with data fetched from a specified URL. Additionally, Fibonacci Time Zones annotations are included, which can be updated with a green color when the 'Apply colors' button is clicked. The range selector is set to display one range, and the x-axis is configured to be non-ordinal. This setup ensures a clear and styled visualization of the stock data with interactive annotations.
